section.name: Overview
section.p: Crawls using file system here, describes how to set file system authentication is required. Fess is corresponding to a crawl for a shared folder in Windows.

subsection.name: How to display
subsection.p: In Administrator account after logging in, click the menu file system authentication.

subsection.name: Host name
subsection.p: Specifies the host name of the site that requires authentication. Is omitted, the specified file system Kroll set applicable in any host name.

subsection.name: Port
subsection.p: Specifies the port of the site that requires authentication. Specify-1 to apply for all ports. File system Crawl settings specified in that case applies on any port.

subsection.name: Authentication methods
subsection.p: Select the authentication method. You can use SAMBA (Windows shared folder authentication).

subsection.name: User name
subsection.p: Specifies the user name to log in authentication.

subsection.name: Password
subsection.p: Specifies the password to log into the certification site.

subsection.name: Parameter
subsection.p: Sets if the authentication site login required settings. SAMBA, the set value of the domain. If you want to write as.

subsection.name: File system name
subsection.p: Select a file name to apply the authentication settings for the above. Must be registered ago you file system CROLL.
